snippet: Most of the recognizable names on Chicago's and Dallas' teams are on the offensive side of the ball, but both squads have been surviving mostly on defense. It may be time for those well-known players on offense to start earning their paychecks.
abstract: Most of the recognizable names on Chicago's and Dallas' teams are on the offensive side of the ball, but both squads have been surviving mostly on defense. It may be time for those well-known players on offense to start earning their paychecks.
